item.title: Version 3.0.0-beta18
item.description: Time Filter for Events; Fixed crash on newer versions of Windows.

item.title: Version 3.0.0-beta17
item.description: Fixed Secondary Windows; Improved logging; and Addressed memory leaks and stream continuity.

item.title: Version 3.0.0-beta16
item.description: Improved iOS support, improved events fetching logic and performance and implemented software zoom.

item.title: Version 3.0.0-beta15
item.description: macOS support, search and late stream management.

item.title: Version 3.0.0-beta14
item.description: Multicast support, external streams and Linux stability.

item.title: Version 3.0.0-beta13
item.description: Redesigned Settings, optmized Servers and updated translations.

item.title: Version 3.0.0-beta12
item.description: Possibility to filter events by time. Correctly show video when there is any special characters on the password.

item.title: Version 3.0.0-beta11
item.description: Reworked the Timeline of Events and improved overall look and feel. A lot of bug fixes and UX improvements

item.title: Version 3.0.0-beta10
item.description: Fixed events parsing from latest server

item.title: Version 3.0.0-beta9
item.description: Add in-ap Upgrade. Improved Linux support and local memory management.

item.title: Version 3.0.0-beta8
item.description: Linux support and a bunch of bug fixes and performance improvements.

item.title: Version 3.0.0-beta7
item.description: PTZ cameras support, reworked grid on mobile and bug fixes.
